trans-unit.source: The new error_reporting level. It takes on either a bitmask, or named constants. Using named constants is strongly encouraged to ensure compatibility for future versions. As error levels are added, the range of integers increases, so older integer-based error levels will not always behave as expected.
trans-unit.target: 新的error_reporting级别。它采用位掩码或命名常量。强烈建议使用命名常量，以确保与未来版本兼容。随着错误级别的增加，整数的范围会增加，因此较早的基于整数的错误级别将不会始终表现出预期的效果。

trans-unit.source: The number of event priority levels.

trans-unit.target: 分销失败的次数

trans-unit.source: The number of fields (columns) in the result. On error, -1 is returned.

trans-unit.target: 结果集的字段数。

trans-unit.source: The number of files contained within this phar, or 0 (the number zero) if none.

trans-unit.source: The number of hits on success, or FALSE on failure.
trans-unit.target: 成功，或命中数 FALSE 失败。

trans-unit.source: The number of in-between images to generate.
trans-unit.target: 要生成的中间图像的数量。

trans-unit.source: The number of internal iterations to perform for the derivation.
trans-unit.target: 执行推导的内部迭代次数。

trans-unit.source: The number of items to fetch
trans-unit.target: 采集的项目数量

trans-unit.source: The number of iteration to apply the morphology function. A value of -1 means loop until no change found. How this is applied may depend on the morphology method. Typically this is a value of 1.
trans-unit.target: 应用形态函数的迭代次数。值为-1表示循环,直到没有发现变化。如何应用可能取决于形态学方法。通常情况下,这个值为1。

trans-unit.source: The number of iterations desired. » NIST recommends at least 10,000.
trans-unit.target: 所需的迭代次数。»NIST建议至少10,000。

trans-unit.source: The number of iterations the image should loop over. Set to '0' to loop continuously.
trans-unit.target: 图像应循环的迭代次数。设置为'0'表示连续循环。

trans-unit.source: The number of key-value pairs to ignore when using cdb databases. This value is ignored for all other databases which do not support multiple keys with the same name.
trans-unit.target: 使用cdb数据库时要忽略的键值对的数量。对于不支持同名多键的所有其他数据库,该值被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The number of matching characters is calculated by finding the longest first common substring, and then doing this for the prefixes and the suffixes, recursively. The lengths of all found common substrings are added.
trans-unit.target: 匹配字符的数量是通过找到最长的第一个公共子串来计算的,然后对前缀和后缀进行递归计算。所有找到的共同子串的长度相加。

trans-unit.source: The number of messages waiting to be read from the queue.
trans-unit.target: 等待从队列中读取的信息数量。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds into the day at which the weekend begins or ends or FALSE on failure.
trans-unit.target: 周末开始或结束时的毫秒数， FALSE 失败则为FALSE。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds that have passed since the reference date. This number is derived from the system time.
trans-unit.target: 自参考日期以来已过去的毫秒数。该数字来自系统时间。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds to wait for a lock. A value of -1 is infinite.
trans-unit.target: 等待锁的毫秒数。值为-1时为无限。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds to wait for the event to be fired. A value of -1 is infinite.
trans-unit.target: 等待事件发生的毫秒数。值为-1表示无限。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds to wait for the exclusive lock. A value of -1 is infinite.
trans-unit.target: 等待独占锁的毫秒数。值为-1时为无限。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds to wait for the semaphore. A value of -1 is infinite.
trans-unit.target: 等待信号体的毫秒数。值为-1则表示无限。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds to wait while trying to connect. Use 0 to wait indefinitely. If libcurl is built to use the standard system name resolver, that portion of the connect will still use full-second resolution for timeouts with a minimum timeout allowed of one second.
trans-unit.target: 试图连接时等待的毫秒数。使用0表示无限期等待。如果libcurl在构建时使用了标准的系统名解析器,那么这部分连接仍将使用全秒解析来超时,最小允许超时一秒。

trans-unit.source: The number of minimal days to set.
trans-unit.target: 设定的最小天数。

trans-unit.source: The number of nodes in the list. The range of valid child node indices is 0 to length - 1 inclusive.
trans-unit.target: 列表中的节点数。有效子节点索引的范围是0到长度-包括1。

trans-unit.source: The number of nodes in the map. The range of valid child node indices is 0 to length - 1 inclusive.
trans-unit.target: 映射中的节点数。有效子节点索引的范围是0到长度-包括1。

trans-unit.source: The number of objects in the storage.
trans-unit.target: 存储器中对象的数量。

trans-unit.source: The number of parameters.
trans-unit.target: 参数的数量。

trans-unit.source: The number of parent directories to go up.
trans-unit.target: 父目录的数量要上去。

trans-unit.source: The number of pending watchers. 0 indicates that there are no watchers pending.
trans-unit.target: 待定观察者的数量。 0 表示没有观察者挂起。

trans-unit.source: The number of priorities per event base.
trans-unit.target: 每个活动基地的优先级数。

trans-unit.source: The number of processes that can acquire the semaphore simultaneously is set to max_acquire.
trans-unit.target: 可以同时获取信号量的进程数设置为 max_acquire 。

trans-unit.source: The number of public properties in the ArrayObject.
trans-unit.target: ArrayObject中公共属性的数量。

trans-unit.source: The number of read and/or write event watchers per fd is unlimited. Setting all file descriptors to non-blocking mode is also usually a good idea(but not required).
trans-unit.target: 每个 fd 的读取和/或写入事件监视程序的数量是无限的。将所有文件描述符设置为非阻塞模式通常也是一个好主意（但不是必需的）。

trans-unit.source: The number of recurrences.
trans-unit.target: 复发的次数。

trans-unit.source: The number of remaining tasks in the pool to be collected.
trans-unit.target: 采集池中剩余的任务数量。

trans-unit.source: The number of remaining tasks on the worker's stack to be collected.
trans-unit.target: 工人堆栈上剩余的任务数量,以便收集。

trans-unit.source: The number of required parameters.
trans-unit.target: 所需参数的数量。

trans-unit.source: The number of returned directories and files, as an integer.
trans-unit.target: 返回的目录和文件数，以整数表示。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows affected by the query. If no tuple is affected, it will return 0.
trans-unit.target: 受查询影响的行数。如果没有元组受到影响,将返回0。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows in the result. On error, -1 is returned.
trans-unit.target: 结果中的行数。错误时,返回-1。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows in the scaled image.
trans-unit.target: 缩放图像的行数。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows to skip.
trans-unit.target: 跳过的行数。

trans-unit.source: The number of seconds relative to the start of the minute. Negative values reference the second in the previous minute. Values greater than 59 reference the appropriate second in the following minute(s).
trans-unit.target: 相对于 minute 开始的秒数。负值引用前一分钟的秒数。大于59的值将在接下来的分钟内显示适当的秒数。

trans-unit.source: The number of seconds the transfer speed should be below CURLOPT_LOW_SPEED_LIMIT before PHP considers the transfer too slow and aborts.
trans-unit.target: 在PHP认为传输速度太慢并中止之前，传输速度的秒数应低于 CURLOPT_LOW_SPEED_LIMIT 。

trans-unit.source: The number of seconds to keep DNS entries in memory. This option is set to 120 (2 minutes) by default.
trans-unit.target: 在内存中保留DNS条目的秒数。该选项默认设置为120(2分钟)。

trans-unit.source: The number of seconds to wait while trying to connect. Use 0 to wait indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 试图连接时要等待的秒数。使用0表示无限期等待。

trans-unit.source: The number of seconds to wait. If seconds is zero, no new alarm is created.
trans-unit.target: 等待的秒数。如果 seconds 为零，则不会创建新警报。

trans-unit.source: The number of similar documents to return for each result
trans-unit.target: 每个结果要返回的类似文件的数量。

trans-unit.source: The number of success
trans-unit.target: 成功的次数

trans-unit.source: The number of success samples of the distribution
trans-unit.target: 分布的成功样本数

trans-unit.source: The number of success, at which the probability mass is calculated
trans-unit.target: 成功的次数,在此计算概率质量。

trans-unit.source: The number of the day relative to the end of the previous month. Values 1 to 28, 29, 30 or 31 (depending upon the month) reference the normal days in the relevant month. Values less than 1 (including negative values) reference the days in the previous month, so 0 is the last day of the previous month, -1 is the day before that, etc. Values greater than the number of days in the relevant month reference the appropriate day in the following month(s).
trans-unit.target: 相对于上月末的天数。值1至28、29、30或31(取决于月份)是相关月份的正常天数。小于1的值(包括负值)是指上个月的天数,所以0是上个月的最后一天,-1是前一天,等等。大于相关月份天数的值是指下个月的相应天数。

trans-unit.source: The number of the hour relative to the start of the day determined by month, day and year. Negative values reference the hour before midnight of the day in question. Values greater than 23 reference the appropriate hour in the following day(s).
trans-unit.target: 相对于一天开始的小时数，由 month ， day 和 year 确定。负值引用的是相关日期的午夜前一小时。大于23的值表示第二天的适当小时。

trans-unit.source: The number of the minute relative to the start of the hour. Negative values reference the minute in the previous hour. Values greater than 59 reference the appropriate minute in the following hour(s).
trans-unit.target: 相对于 hour 开始的分钟数。负值表示前一小时的分钟。大于59的值将在接下来的小时内引用适当的分钟。

trans-unit.source: The number of the month relative to the end of the previous year. Values 1 to 12 reference the normal calendar months of the year in question. Values less than 1 (including negative values) reference the months in the previous year in reverse order, so 0 is December, -1 is November, etc. Values greater than 12 reference the appropriate month in the following year(s).
trans-unit.target: 相对于前一年年底的月份数。值1至12是指该年的正常日历月份。小于1的值(包括负值)按相反的顺序引用上一年的月份,所以0代表12月,-1代表11月,等等。大于12的值是指下一年的相应月份。

trans-unit.source: The number of the signal that caused the child process to stop its execution (only meaningful if stopped is TRUE).
trans-unit.target: 该信号导致子进程停止执行的数量（如果只有有意义的停止是 TRUE ）。

trans-unit.source: The number of the signal that caused the child process to terminate its execution (only meaningful if signaled is TRUE).
trans-unit.target: 导致子进程终止其执行的信号编号（仅在信号为 TRUE 时才有意义）。

trans-unit.source: The number of the success of the distribution
trans-unit.target: 分配成功的数量

trans-unit.source: The number of the year, may be a two or four digit value, with values between 0-69 mapping to 2000-2069 and 70-100 to 1970-2000. On systems where time_t is a 32bit signed integer, as most common today, the valid range for year is somewhere between 1901 and 2038. However, before PHP 5.1.0 this range was limited from 1970 to 2038 on some systems (e.g. Windows).
trans-unit.target: 年份的数字可以是两位或四位数字的值，0-69之间的值映射到2000-2069，而70-100到1970-2000。在time_t是32位有符号整数的系统上（今天最为常见）， year 的有效范围在1901至2038之间。但是，在PHP 5.1.0之前，此范围在某些系统（例如Windows）上从1970到2038被限制。

trans-unit.source: The number of tiles per row and page (e.g. 6x4+0+0).
trans-unit.target: 每行和每页的瓷砖数量(如6x4+0+0)。

trans-unit.source: The number of times Ev::run() was entered minus the number of times Ev::run() was exited normally, in other words, the recursion depth. Outside Ev::run() , this number is 0 . In a callback, this number is 1 , unless Ev::run() was invoked recursively (or from another thread), in which case it is higher.
trans-unit.target: 次数EV（）::运行被输入减去的次数EV :: run（）中是正常退出，换句话说，递归深度。在Ev :: run（）之外，此数字为 0 。在回调中，此数字为 1 ，除非递归地（或从另一个线程）调用Ev :: run（），在这种情况下，它会更高。

trans-unit.source: The number of times the needle substring occurs in the haystackstring.
trans-unit.target: 的次数 needle 子发生在 haystack 字符串。

trans-unit.source: The number of times the deque should be rotated.

trans-unit.target: 顺序旋转的次数。

trans-unit.target: 审判次数

trans-unit.target: 分配的试验次数

trans-unit.target: 变量的数量和字符串 types 长度必须与语句中的参数匹配。

trans-unit.source: The old endpoint URL.

trans-unit.source: The old value (the value currently stored).

trans-unit.target: generator 可以安全调用的唯一APCu函数是apcu_entry（）。

trans-unit.source: The only code construct allowed before a namespace declaration is the declare statement, for defining encoding of a source file. In addition, no non-PHP code may precede a namespace declaration, including extra whitespace:

trans-unit.source: The only parameter of this method is an array containing exported properties in the form array('property' => value, ...).

trans-unit.source: The opacity.

trans-unit.source: The opaque job handle.
trans-unit.target: 不透明的工作把手。

trans-unit.source: The open callback works like a constructor in classes and is executed when the session is being opened. It is the first callback function executed when the session is started automatically or manually with session_start(). Return value is TRUE for success, FALSE for failure.
trans-unit.target: open回调的工作方式类似于类中的构造函数，并在打开会话时执行。它是在会话自动启动或使用session_start（）手动启动时执行的第一个回调函数。对于成功，返回值为 TRUE ，对于失败，返回值为 FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: The opened archive's API version. This is not to be confused with the API version that the loaded phar extension will use to create new phars. Each Phar archive has the API version hard-coded into its manifest. See Phar file format documentation for more information.
trans-unit.target: 打开的档案的API版本。这不要与已加载的phar扩展将用于创建新phar的API版本混淆。每个Phar归档文件的清单中都硬编码了API版本。有关更多信息，请参见Phar文件格式文档。

trans-unit.source: The opened file as an SplFileObjectobject.

trans-unit.source: The optional $offset parameter allows you to specify where in $haystack to start searching as an offset in grapheme units (not bytes or characters). If the offset is negative, it is treated relative to the end of the string. The position returned is still relative to the beginning of haystack regardless of the value of $offset.

trans-unit.source: The optional encoding specifies the character encoding for the input/output in PHP 4. Starting from PHP 5, the input encoding is automatically detected, so that the encoding parameter specifies only the output encoding. In PHP 4, the default output encoding is the same as the input charset. If empty string is passed, the parser attempts to identify which encoding the document is encoded in by looking at the heading 3 or 4 bytes. In PHP 5.0.0 and 5.0.1, the default output charset is ISO-8859-1, while in PHP 5.0.2 and upper is UTF-8. The supported encodings are ISO-8859-1, UTF-8 and US-ASCII.
trans-unit.target: 可选 encoding 指定PHP 4中输入/输出的字符编码。从PHP 5开始，将自动检测输入编码，因此 encoding 参数仅指定输出编码。在PHP 4中，默认输出编码与输入字符集相同。如果传递了空字符串，则解析器将通过查看标题3或4字节来尝试确定文档采用哪种编码。在PHP 5.0.0和5.0.1中，默认输出字符集为ISO-8859-1，而在PHP 5.0.2中，默认输出字符集为UTF-8。支持的编码为ISO-8859-1，UTF-8和US-ASCII。

trans-unit.source: The overloading methods are invoked when interacting with properties or methods that have not been declared or are not visible in the current scope. trans-unit.source: The power of regular expressions comes from the ability to include alternatives and repetitions in the pattern. These are encoded in the pattern by the use of meta-characters, which do not stand for themselves but instead are interpreted in some special way.
trans-unit.target: 正则表达式的功能来自在模式中包含替代和重复项的能力。这些通过使用元字符在模式中进行编码，这些元字符本身并不代表而是以某种特殊方式进行解释。

trans-unit.source: The precedence of an operator specifies how "tightly" it binds two expressions together. For example, in the expression 1 + 5 * 3, the answer is 16 and not 18 because the multiplication ("*") operator has a higher precedence than the addition ("+") operator. Parentheses may be used to force precedence, if necessary. For instance: (1 + 5) * 3 evaluates to 18.
trans-unit.target: 运算符的优先级指定它如何“紧密”地将两个表达式绑定在一起。例如，在表达式1 + 5 * 3中，答案是16而不是18，因为乘法（“ *”）运算符的优先级高于加法（“ +”）运算符。如有必要，可以使用括号来强制优先级。例如：（1 + 5）* 3计算为18。

trans-unit.source: The precise effect of "\cx" is as follows: if "x" is a lower case letter, it is converted to upper case. Then bit 6 of the character (hex 40) is inverted. Thus "\cz" becomes hex 1A, but "\c{" becomes hex 3B, while "\c;" becomes hex 7B.
trans-unit.target: “ \ cx ” 的精确效果如下：如果“ x ”是小写字母，则将其转换为大写字母。然后将字符的第6位（十六进制40）反转。因此，“ \ cz ”变为十六进制1A，而“ \ c { ”变为十六进制3B，而“ \ c; ”变为十六进制7B。

trans-unit.source: The primary advantage of pg_query_params() over pg_query() is that parameter values may be separated from the query string, thus avoiding the need for tedious and error-prone quoting and escaping. Unlike pg_query(), pg_query_params() allows at most one SQL command in the given string. (There can be semicolons in it, but not more than one nonempty command.)

trans-unit.source: The pseudo-variable $this is available inside any class method when that method is called from within an object context. $this is a reference to the calling object (usually the object to which the method belongs, but possibly another object, if the method is called statically from the context of a secondary object).
trans-unit.target: 当从对象上下文中调用该方法时，伪变量 $this 可以在任何类方法中使用。 $this 是对调用对象的引用（通常是该方法所属的对象，但如果从辅助对象的上下文中静态调用该方法，则可能是另一个对象）。

trans-unit.source: The pseudo-variable $this is available when a method is called from within an object context. $this is a reference to the calling object (usually the object to which the method belongs, but possibly another object, if the method is called statically from the context of a secondary object). As of PHP 7.0.0 calling a non-static method statically from an incompatible context results in $this being undefined inside the method. Calling a non-static method statically from an incompatible context has been deprecated as of PHP 5.6.0. As of PHP 7.0.0 calling a non-static method statically has been generally deprecated (even if called from a compatible context). Before PHP 5.6.0 such calls already triggered a strict notice.
trans-unit.target: 从对象上下文中调用方法时，伪变量 $this 可用。 $this 是对调用对象的引用（通常是该方法所属的对象，但如果从辅助对象的上下文中静态调用该方法，则可能是另一个对象）。从PHP 7.0.0起，从不兼容的上下文中静态调用非静态方法会导致$ this在方法内部未定义。从PHP 5.6.0开始，不赞成从不兼容的上下文中静态调用非静态方法。自PHP 7.0.0起，通常不赞成静态调用非静态方法（即使从兼容上下文调用）。在PHP 5.6.0之前，此类调用已经触发了严格的通知。

trans-unit.source: The reference counter of the returned object will be incremented by one to protect internal structures against premature destruction when the method is called from a user callback. trans-unit.target: 当从用户回调中调用该方法时，返回对象的引用计数器将增加一，以保护内部结构免于过早破坏。因此，应使用EventBufferEvent :: free（）方法显式释放EventBufferEvent对象。否则，内存将泄漏。

trans-unit.source: The size of an integer is platform-dependent, although a maximum value of about two billion is the usual value (that's 32 bits signed). 64-bit platforms usually have a maximum value of about 9E18, except on Windows prior to PHP 7, where it was always 32 bit. PHP does not support unsigned integers. Integer size can be determined using the constant PHP_INT_SIZE, maximum value using the constant PHP_INT_MAX since PHP 5.0.5, and minimum value using the constant PHP_INT_MIN since PHP 7.0.0.

trans-unit.source: The socket resource returned by socket_accept() may not be used to accept new connections. The original listening socket socket, however, remains open and may be reused.
trans-unit.target: socket_accept（）返回的套接字资源不能用于接受新连接。但是，原始的监听套接字 socket 保持打开状态，并且可以重复使用。

trans-unit.source: The socket to get the name of.
trans-unit.target: 要获取的插座名称。

trans-unit.source: The socket to send data to.
trans-unit.target: 向其发送 data 的套接字。

trans-unit.source: The socket will by default be opened in blocking mode. You can switch it to non-blocking mode by using stream_set_blocking().
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，该套接字将以阻止模式打开。您可以使用stream_set_blocking（）将其切换为非阻塞模式。

trans-unit.source: The sockets listed in the except array will be watched for exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 将监视 except 阵列中列出的插槽是否有异常。

trans-unit.source: The sockets listed in the read array will be watched to see if characters become available for reading (more precisely, to see if a read will not block - in particular, a socket resource is also ready on end-of-file, in which case a socket_read() will return a zero length string).
trans-unit.target: 将监视 read 数组中列出的套接字，以查看是否有字符可用于读取（更确切地说，看是否读取不会阻塞-特别是在文件结束时套接字资源也已准备就绪，在这种情况下一个socket_read（）将返回一个零长度字符串）。

trans-unit.source: The sockets listed in the write array will be watched to see if a write will not block.
trans-unit.target: 将监视 write 数组中列出的套接字，以查看是否不会阻止写操作。

trans-unit.source: The soft limit, in whatever unit the resource limit requires, or POSIX_RLIMIT_INFINITY.
trans-unit.target: 软限制，即资源限制所需的任何单位，或 POSIX_RLIMIT_INFINITY 。

trans-unit.target: 排序方向。这应该是SolrQuery::ORDER_ASC或SolrQuery::ORDER_DESC。

trans-unit.source: The source of the IV. The source can be MCRYPT_RAND (system random number generator), MCRYPT_DEV_RANDOM (read data from /dev/random) and MCRYPT_DEV_URANDOM (read data from /dev/urandom). Prior to 5.3.0, MCRYPT_RAND was the only one supported on Windows.
trans-unit.target: IV的来源。源可以是 MCRYPT_RAND （系统随机数生成器）， MCRYPT_DEV_RANDOM （从 /dev/random 读取数据）和 MCRYPT_DEV_URANDOM （从 /dev/urandom 读取数据）。在5.3.0之前， MCRYPT_RAND 是Windows上唯一受支持的版本。

trans-unit.source: The special ::class constant are available as of PHP 5.5.0, and allows for fully qualified class name resolution at compile, this is useful for namespaced classes:
trans-unit.target: 从PHP 5.5.0开始，特殊的 ::class 常量可用，并允许在编译时进行完全限定的类名解析，这对于命名空间类很有用：

trans-unit.source: The special NULL value represents a variable with no value. NULL is the only possible value of type null.
trans-unit.target: 特殊的 NULL 值表示没有值的变量。 NULL 是null类型的唯一可能值。

trans-unit.source: The special regular expression characters are: . \ + * ? [ ^ ] $ ( ) { } = ! < > | : -
trans-unit.target: 特殊的正​​则表达式字符为：。\ + *吗？[^] $（）{} =！<> | ：-

trans-unit.source: The specification can also be represented as a date time. A sample of one year and four days would be P0001-00-04T00:00:00. But the values in this format can not exceed a given period's roll-over-point (e.g. 25 hours is invalid).
trans-unit.target: 规范也可以表示为日期时间。一年零四天的示例为P0001-00-04T00：00：00。但是此格式的值不能超过给定时间段的转折点（例如25小时无效）。

trans-unit.source: The specified character.
trans-unit.target: 指定的字符。

trans-unit.source: The specified format as described in the sprintf() documentation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的格式，如sprintf（）文档中所述。

trans-unit.source: The specified substring. If the sum of offset and count exceeds the length, then all 16-bit units to the end of the data are returned.
trans-unit.target: 指定的子字符串。如果 offset 和 count 之和超过长度，则返回到数据末尾的所有16位单元。

trans-unit.source: The sql state with the error.
trans-unit.target: 有错误的sql状态。

trans-unit.source: The square root of arg or the special value NAN for negative numbers.
trans-unit.target: arg 的平方根或负数的特殊值NAN。

trans-unit.source: The standard DES-based crypt() returns the salt as the first two characters of the output. It also only uses the first eight characters of str, so longer strings that start with the same eight characters will generate the same result (when the same salt is used).
trans-unit.target: 基于DES的标准crypt（）返回salt作为输出的前两个字符。它还仅使用 str 的前八个字符，因此以相同的八个字符开头的较长字符串将产生相同的结果（使用相同的salt时）。

trans-unit.source: The standard deviation of the Gaussian, in pixels
trans-unit.target: 高斯的标准偏差,以像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: The standard deviation of the Gaussian, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 高斯的标准偏差,以像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: The standard deviation of the distribution
trans-unit.target: 分布的标准差

trans-unit.source: The standard deviation of the normal distribution
trans-unit.target: 正态分布的标准差

trans-unit.source: The standard fragmenter is gap. Another option is regex, which tries to create fragments that resembles a certain regular expression
trans-unit.target: 标准的碎片器是gap。另一种选择是regex,它试图创建类似于某种正则表达式的片段。

trans-unit.source: The start date of the period.
trans-unit.target: 该时期的开始日期;

trans-unit.source: The start index (in UTF-16 code units) from which the string will start to be transformed, inclusive. Indexing starts at 0. The text before will be left as is.
trans-unit.target: 字符串的起始索引(以UTF-16编码为单位),字符串将从这里开始转换,包括在内。索引从0开始,之前的文本将保持不变。

trans-unit.source: The start of the astronomical dawn (zenith angle = 108°). It ends at nautical_twilight_begin.
trans-unit.target: 天文学黎明的开始（天顶角= 108°）。它以nautical_twilight_begin结尾。

trans-unit.source: The start of the civil dawn (zenith angle = 96°). It ends at sunrise.
trans-unit.target: 民事黎明的开始（天顶角= 96°）。它在日出时结束。

trans-unit.source: The start of the nautical dawn (zenith angle = 102°). It ends at civil_twilight_begin.
trans-unit.target: 航海黎明的开始（天顶角= 102°）。它结束于civil_twilight_begin。

trans-unit.source: The start position for the comparison. If negative, it starts counting from the end of the string.
trans-unit.target: 比较的起始位置。如果是负数,则从字符串的末端开始计算。

trans-unit.source: The start position of data to be substracted.
trans-unit.target: 要分馏的数据的起始位置。

trans-unit.source: The start position offset. Number of characters from the beginning of string (first character is 0), or if start is negative, number of characters from the end of the string.
trans-unit.target: 起始位置的偏移量。从字符串开始的字符数(第一个字符为0),如果start为负数,则从字符串结束的字符数。

trans-unit.source: The start/offset, in bytes, to begin reading.
trans-unit.target: 开始读取的起始/偏移量,以字节为单位。

trans-unit.source: The start/offset, in bytes, to begin writing.
trans-unit.target: 开始写入的起始/偏移量,以字节为单位。

trans-unit.source: The starting bit.
trans-unit.target: 的起始位。

trans-unit.source: The starting byte of the file range to be synchronized
trans-unit.target: 要同步的文件范围的起始字节。

trans-unit.source: The starting line number, as an integer.
trans-unit.target: 起始行号，以整数表示。

trans-unit.source: The starting line number.
trans-unit.target: 起始线号。

trans-unit.source: The starting x coordinate of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 操作的起始x坐标。

trans-unit.source: The starting y coordinate of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 操作的起始Y坐标。

trans-unit.source: The statement for which the row count is returned. The statment resource must be created with a static or keyset cursor. For more information, see sqlsrv_query(), sqlsrv_prepare(), or » Specifying a Cursor Type and Selecting Rows in the Microsoft SQLSRV documentation.
trans-unit.target: 返回其行数的语句。声明资源必须使用静态或键集游标创建。有关更多信息，请参见sqlsrv_query（），sqlsrv_prepare（）或» Microsoft SQLSRV文档中的“ 指定游标类型并选择行 ”。

trans-unit.source: The statement list for a case can also be empty, which simply passes control into the statement list for the next case.
trans-unit.target: 一个case的语句列表也可以是空的,这只是将控制权传递到下一个case的语句列表中。

trans-unit.source: The statement resource to be cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 要取消的报表资源。

trans-unit.source: The static methods contained in the Cond class provide direct access to Posix Condition Variables.
trans-unit.target: Cond类中包含的静态方法提供了对Posix条件变量的直接访问。

trans-unit.source: The static methods contained in the Mutex class provide direct access to Posix Mutex functionality.
trans-unit.target: Mutex类中包含的静态方法提供了对Posix Mutex功能的直接访问。

trans-unit.source: The static properties, as an array.
trans-unit.target: 静态属性，作为array。

trans-unit.source: The statment for which resources are freed. Note that NULL is a valid parameter value. This allows the function to be called multiple times in a script.
trans-unit.target: 释放资源的语句。请注意， NULL 是有效的参数值。这允许在脚本中多次调用该函数。

trans-unit.source: The statment for which the number of fields is returned. sqlsrv_num_fields() can be called on a statement before or after statement execution.
trans-unit.target: 返回其字段数的语句。可以在语句执行之前或之后在语句上调用sqlsrv_num_fields（）。

trans-unit.source: The statment on which the next result is being called.
trans-unit.target: 调用下一个结果的状态。

trans-unit.source: The statment resource for which metadata is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回元数据的状态资源。

trans-unit.source: The status can be PGSQL_TRANSACTION_IDLE (currently idle), PGSQL_TRANSACTION_ACTIVE (a command is in progress), PGSQL_TRANSACTION_INTRANS (idle, in a valid transaction block), or PGSQL_TRANSACTION_INERROR (idle, in a failed transaction block). PGSQL_TRANSACTION_UNKNOWN is reported if the connection is bad. PGSQL_TRANSACTION_ACTIVE is reported only when a query has been sent to the server and not yet completed.
trans-unit.target: 状态可以是 PGSQL_TRANSACTION_IDLE （当前空闲）， PGSQL_TRANSACTION_ACTIVE （命令正在执行）， PGSQL_TRANSACTION_INTRANS （有效事务块中的空闲）或 PGSQL_TRANSACTION_INERROR （失败事务块中的空闲）。如果连接不良，则报告 PGSQL_TRANSACTION_UNKNOWN 。仅当查询已发送到服务器但尚未完成时，才报告 PGSQL_TRANSACTION_ACTIVE 。

trans-unit.source: The status of the output buffer.
trans-unit.target: 输出缓冲区的状态。

trans-unit.source: The step, or value to decrease.
trans-unit.target: 步,或者说要减少的值。

trans-unit.source: The step, or value to increase.
trans-unit.target: 步,或者说要增加的价值。

trans-unit.source: The storage containing the elements to remove.
trans-unit.target: 包含要删除的元素的存储。

trans-unit.source: The storage containing the elements to retain in the current storage.
trans-unit.target: 包含当前存储中要保留的元素的存储。

trans-unit.source: The storage object will never contain more than one object with the same identifier. As such, it can be used to implement a set (a collection of unique values) where the quality of an object being unique is determined by the value returned by this function being unique.
trans-unit.target: 存储对象永远不会包含一个以上具有相同标识符的对象。因此,它可以用来实现一个集合(唯一值的集合),其中一个对象是否是唯一的质量由这个函数返回的值是否是唯一决定。

trans-unit.source: The storage you want to import.
trans-unit.target: 你要导入的存储空间。

trans-unit.source: The stored variable or array of variables on success; FALSE on failure
trans-unit.target: 成功时存储的变量或变量数组；失败时为 FALSE

trans-unit.source: The stream resource or URL to check.
trans-unit.target: 要检查的流资源或URL。

trans-unit.source: The stream can be any stream created by fopen(), fsockopen() and pfsockopen().
trans-unit.target: 该流可以是由fopen（），fsockopen（）和pfsockopen（）创建的任何流。

trans-unit.source: The stream context resource (created with stream_context_create())
trans-unit.target: 流上下文资源（使用stream_context_create（）创建）

trans-unit.source: The stream filter to be removed.
trans-unit.target: 要拆除的流过滤器。

trans-unit.target: 要寻找的流偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The stream on which the function will operate.
trans-unit.target: 该函数将在其上运行的流。

trans-unit.source: The stream or context resource to apply the options to.
trans-unit.target: 要应用选项的流或上下文资源。
